Source.SQL: select * from( select ROW_NUMBER() over (order by A.quluanrq asc)as 序号,convert(varchar(20),A.quluanrq,23) as 取卵日期,B.nvfangxm as 女方姓名,B.nanfangxm as 男方姓名, dbo.SplitString(B.binglih,'_',1) as 女方病历号,dbo.SplitString(B.binglih,'_',2) as 男方病历号,B.zhouqixh as 周期序号,C.zhouqijj as 周期总结, H.shoujingfs as 授精方式, (select count(*) from embrycul_record where yuanhes1='1PN' and binglih=A.binglih and zhouqixh=A.zhouqixh and zhouqilx=A.zhouqilx)as '1PN个数', (select count(*) from embrycul_record where yuanhes1='2PN' and binglih=A.binglih and zhouqixh=A.zhouqixh and zhouqilx=A.zhouqilx)as '2PN个数', (select count(*) from embrycul_record where yuanhes1='3PN' and binglih=A.binglih and zhouqixh=A.zhouqixh and zhouqilx=A.zhouqilx)as '3PN个数', (select count(*) from embrycul_record where chengshud0='MII' and binglih=A.binglih and zhouqixh=A.zhouqixh and zhouqilx=A.zhouqilx)as 'MII卵数', case when gonghuols is null then 0 when gonghuols='' then 0 else convert(int,D.gonghuols) end as 获卵数, case when gonghuols is null then 1 when gonghuols='' then 1 when convert(int,D.gonghuols) = 0 then 1 else 0 end as 未获卵记数, (select count(*) from embrycul_record where yuanhes1='2PN' and CONVERT(int,case xibaos3 when '融' then 3 when '融合' then 4 else xibaos3 end)>=2 and binglih=A.binglih and zhouqixh=A.zhouqixh and zhouqilx=A.zhouqilx)as 卵裂个数, (select count(*) from embrycul_record aa left join blastula_record bb on aa.binglih=bb.binglih and aa.zhouqilx=bb.zhouqilx and aa.zhouqixh=bb.zhouqixh and aa.lineid=bb.lineid where aa.yuanhes1='2PN' and CONVERT(int,case aa.xibaos3 when '融' then 3 when '融合' then 4 else aa.xibaos3 end)>=2 and aa.binglih=A.binglih and aa.zhouqixh=A.zhouqixh and aa.zhouqilx=A.zhouqilx and (aa.quxiang3='YZ' or bb.quxiang4='YZ' or bb.quxiang5='YZ' or bb.quxiang6='YZ' or bb.quxiang7='YZ' or aa.quxiang3 like 'F%' or bb.quxiang4 like 'F%' or bb.quxiang5 like 'F%' or bb.quxiang6 like 'F%' or bb.quxiang7 like 'F%'))as 卵裂利用个数, (select count(*) from embrycul_record aa left join blastula_record bb on aa.binglih=bb.binglih and aa.zhouqilx=bb.zhouqilx and aa.zhouqixh=bb.zhouqixh and aa.lineid=bb.lineid where aa.yuanhes1='2PN' and CONVERT(int,case aa.xibaos3 when '融' then 3 when '融合' then 4 else aa.xibaos3 end)>=2 and aa.binglih=A.binglih and aa.zhouqixh=A.zhouqixh and aa.zhouqilx=A.zhouqilx and (aa.quxiang3='YZ' or aa.quxiang3 like 'F%'))as 卵裂胚胎D3利用个数, (select count(*) from embrycul_record aa left join blastula_record bb on aa.binglih=bb.binglih and aa.zhouqilx=bb.zhouqilx and aa.zhouqixh=bb.zhouqixh and aa.lineid=bb.lineid where aa.yuanhes1='2PN' and CONVERT(int,case aa.xibaos3 when '融' then 3 when '融合' then 4 else aa.xibaos3 end)>=2 and aa.binglih=A.binglih and aa.zhouqixh=A.zhouqixh and aa.zhouqilx=A.zhouqilx and (bb.quxiang5='YZ' or bb.quxiang6='YZ' or bb.quxiang7='YZ' or bb.quxiang5 like 'F%' or bb.quxiang6 like 'F%' or bb.quxiang7 like 'F%'))as 卵裂囊胚利用个数, (select count(*) from embrycul_record aa left join blastula_record bb on aa.binglih=bb.binglih and aa.zhouqilx=bb.zhouqilx and aa.zhouqixh=bb.zhouqixh and aa.lineid=bb.lineid where aa.binglih=A.binglih and aa.zhouqixh=A.zhouqixh and aa.zhouqilx=A.zhouqilx and (aa.quxiang3='YZ' or bb.quxiang4='YZ' or bb.quxiang5='YZ' or bb.quxiang6='YZ' or bb.quxiang7='YZ' or aa.quxiang3 like 'F%' or bb.quxiang4 like 'F%' or bb.quxiang5 like 'F%' or bb.quxiang6 like 'F%' or bb.quxiang7 like 'F%'))as 胚胎利用个数, (select count(*) from embrycul_record where youpei3='1' and binglih=A.binglih and zhouqixh=A.zhouqixh and zhouqilx=A.zhouqilx)as 优胚, (select count(*) from embrycul_record where quxiang3='YZ' and binglih=A.binglih and zhouqixh=A.zhouqixh and zhouqilx=A.zhouqilx)as D3胚胎移植个数, (select count(*) from embrycul_record where quxiang3='YN' and binglih=A.binglih and zhouqixh=A.zhouqixh and zhouqilx=A.zhouqilx)as D3胚胎养囊个数, G.rc_renshen as 临床妊娠,G.shenhua_table,convert(varchar(20),F.yizhirq,23) as 移植日期1,CONVERT(varchar(20),F1.yizhirq,23) as 移植日期2, (select count(*) from blastula_record where (quxiang7='YZ' or quxiang5='YZ' or quxiang6='YZ') and binglih=A.binglih and zhouqixh=A.zhouqixh and zhouqilx=A.zhouqilx)as 囊胚移植个数, (select count(*) from blastula_record where (quxiang7='YZ' or quxiang5='YZ' or quxiang6='YZ' or quxiang5 like 'F%' or quxiang6 like 'F%' or quxiang7 like 'F%') and binglih=A.binglih and zhouqixh=A.zhouqixh and zhouqilx=A.zhouqilx)as 囊胚利用个数, (select count(*) from blastula_record where (quxiang7='YZ' or quxiang5='YZ' or quxiang6='YZ' or quxiang5 like 'F%' or quxiang6 like 'F%' or quxiang7 like 'F%' or (quxiang5='DQ' and weichengn5<>'1') or (quxiang6='DQ' and weichengn6<>'1') or (quxiang7='DQ' and weichengn7<>'1')) and binglih=A.binglih and zhouqixh=A.zhouqixh and zhouqilx=A.zhouqilx)as 囊胚个数, case when G.rc_yunnangs is null then 0 when G.rc_yunnangs='' then 0 else convert(int,G.rc_yunnangs) end as 孕囊数, (select count(*) from embrycul_record where quxiang3='YZ' and binglih=A.binglih and zhouqixh=A.zhouqixh and zhouqilx=A.zhouqilx) +(select count(*) from blastula_record where (quxiang4='YZ' or quxiang5='YZ' or quxiang6='YZ') and binglih=A.binglih and zhouqixh=A.zhouqixh and zhouqilx=A.zhouqilx) as 总移植个数,G.xinshenger_table from takeegg_record as A left join zhouqi as B on A.binglih=B.binglih and A.zhouqilx=B.zhouqilx and A.zhouqixh=B.zhouqixh left join discuss_cycle as C on A.binglih=C.binglih and A.zhouqilx=C.zhouqilx and A.zhouqixh=C.zhouqixh left join eggdeal_record as D on A.binglih=D.binglih and A.zhouqilx=D.zhouqilx and A.zhouqixh=D.zhouqixh left join insemination_record as E on A.binglih=E.binglih and A.zhouqilx=E.zhouqilx and A.zhouqixh=E.zhouqixh left join embryo_transfer as F on A.binglih=F.binglih and A.zhouqilx=F.zhouqilx and A.zhouqixh=F.zhouqixh and f.zaiciss=0 left join embryo_transfer as F1 on A.binglih=F1.binglih and A.zhouqilx=F1.zhouqilx and A.zhouqixh=F1.zhouqixh and F1.zaiciss=1 left join followUp_record as G on A.binglih=G.binglih and A.zhouqilx=G.zhouqilx and A.zhouqixh=G.zhouqixh left join insemination_record as H on A.binglih=H.binglih and A.zhouqilx=H.zhouqilx and A.zhouqixh=H.zhouqixh where A.quluanrq>='2010-01-01' and A.quluanrq<='2020-08-25' and A.zaiciqlbsf=0 and C.zhouqijj<>'取消取卵' and C.zhouqijj<>'未取卵' )tb @Wheres @OrderBy
